Posts.Content: Jun 7, 2011 04:12PM CHI wrote: I will pray for you.  I know the sick feeling you are feeling. My stomach was in knots all day today. I go for my tests tomorrow and I feel your pain. You aren't alone.  Good luck on Thursday. I'll keep following your posts to see how you're doing.
Posts.Title: Ultrasound shows suspicious lymph node. So scared Chrys23 Beeb75
